header.title: Get in touch today
header.description: Do you have questions about our spring solutions? Contact our team to discuss how we can help realize your ideas.

couplingsprings.title: Coupling Springs
couplingsprings.heroDescription: Engineered for maximum torque transmission and misalignment compensation in demanding powertrain applications.

features.title: High Torque Capacity
features.description: Designed to handle high levels of torque, ensuring reliable performance under heavy loads.

features.title: Vibration Damping
features.description: Effectively absorbs and dampens torsional vibrations, protecting drivetrain components.

features.title: Misalignment Compensation
features.description: Accommodates parallel, angular, and axial misalignment, reducing wear on connected shafts.

bowsprings.title: Bow Springs
bowsprings.heroDescription: Our bow springs provide consistent radial force and flexibility, making them ideal for clutch and transmission systems.

features.title: Consistent Radial Force
features.description: Delivers uniform pressure distribution for smooth engagement and disengagement.

features.title: High Fatigue Life
features.description: Manufactured from premium materials to withstand millions of cycles without failure.

features.title: Compact Design
features.description: Offers a high force-to-size ratio, perfect for applications with limited space.

torsionsprings.title: Torsion Springs
torsionsprings.heroDescription: Custom-designed torsion springs that apply torque or store rotational energy, tailored to your specific application needs.

features.title: Custom Torque Profiles
features.description: Engineered to provide precise torque at specific angular positions.

features.title: Wide Material Selection
features.description: Available in a variety of materials, including stainless steel and exotic alloys, for any environment.

features.title: Diverse End Styles
features.description: Multiple end-of-leg configurations available to suit various mounting requirements.

tensionsprings.title: Tension Springs
tensionsprings.heroDescription: High-performance tension springs designed to operate with a tensile load, providing reliable return force.

features.title: High Initial Tension
features.description: Manufactured to achieve specific initial tensions for a secure and immediate force.

features.title: Variety of Hook Ends
features.description: A wide range of hook and loop configurations to ensure easy integration into your assembly.

features.title: Exceptional Durability
features.description: Constructed from high-tensile materials to ensure long service life under constant stress.

springsystem.title: Spring System
springsystem.heroDescription: Integrated spring systems and assemblies, combining multiple components to perform complex mechanical functions.

features.title: Fully Integrated Assemblies
features.description: We design and manufacture complete sub-assemblies for seamless integration into your products.

features.title: Multi-Functional Design
features.description: Our systems combine various spring types and components to achieve complex motion and force profiles.

features.title: Optimized Performance
features.description: Each system is simulated and tested to ensure optimal performance, reliability, and cost-effectiveness.

valvesprings.title: Valve Springs
valvesprings.heroDescription: High-performance valve springs engineered to withstand the extreme conditions of modern high-revving engines.

features.title: High-Frequency Durability
features.description: Designed to prevent valve float and maintain stability at high engine RPMs.

features.title: Advanced Materials
features.description: Utilizing super-clean chrome-silicon and other high-strength alloys for maximum life and performance.

features.title: Stress-Relieved & Shot-Peened
features.description: All springs undergo advanced manufacturing processes to enhance fatigue strength and durability.

cta.title: Ready to Start Your Project?
cta.description: Our team of experts is ready to help you find the perfect spring solution for your needs. Contact us today to discuss your requirements.

seo.defaultDescription: ISRI-Shuangdi Spring: Providing high-quality solutions compliant with international standards like IATF16949.

hero.title: Shuangdi Precision · Excellence Forged
hero.subtitle: Every precision spring provides core power for the global automotive industry

feature1.title: Global & Local Integration
feature1.description: Combining ISRI's century-old heritage with Shuangdi's advanced manufacturing capabilities.

feature2.title: Precision Products
feature2.description: Specializing in springs and components for clutch, powertrain, steering, braking, and suspension systems.

feature3.title: Certified Quality
feature3.description: Compliant with international standards like IATF16949, ensuring product quality and performance.

about.title: About ISRI-Shuangdi Spring
about.subtitle: Precision Engineering Excellence Since 1919
about.description: Zhejiang Isringhausen Shuangdi Spring Co., Ltd. is a joint venture between Germany's ISRINGHAUSEN Group and Zhejiang Shuangdi Spring Co., Ltd., combining German precision engineering with Chinese manufacturing expertise. We specialize in automotive springs and precision components, delivering high-quality solutions that meet international standards including IATF16949 for leading OEMs worldwide.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Driving innovation with precision springs and components for the world's leading automotive OEMs

heritage.title: Heritage
heritage.description: Over a century of German precision engineering, setting global standards in automotive spring technology.

partnership.title: Partnership
partnership.description: Joint venture combining German engineering excellence with Chinese manufacturing expertise.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Delivering cutting-edge spring solutions for automotive leaders worldwide with certified quality.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: Our team unites international experts and local specialists, combining engineering excellence with deep industry experience.

felix.name: Felix von Heland
felix.bio: Leading ISRI-Shuangdi Spring with expertise in automotive suspension systems and precision spring manufacturing.

niek.name: Niek Bijman
niek.bio: Specializing in advanced spring design and metallurgy, ensuring optimal performance in automotive applications.

chengjie.name: Chengjie Li
chengjie.bio: Expert in precision spring production processes and quality control systems for automotive components.

love.name: Love
love.bio: Overseeing operations and supply chain management for high-volume automotive spring production.

footer.description1: Shuangdi Precision Spring, specializing in springs and components for clutch, powertrain, steering, braking, and suspension systems.
footer.description2: Every precision spring provides core power for the global automotive industry
footer.subscribeSuccess: Thank you for subscribing to our newsletter.
footer.subscribeError: There was a problem subscribing. Please try again later.

features.sectionDescription: Our spring products are widely used in key industries such as automotive, aerospace, energy, and robotics, providing reliable power and innovative solutions for the world.
features.automotiveDescription: Precision springs are widely used in clutches, powertrains, steering, braking, and suspension systems to ensure vehicle safety and performance.
features.aerospaceDescription: High-strength springs are used in aircraft, satellites, and space equipment to ensure reliability and stability in extreme environments.
features.energyDescription: Springs are used in wind power, nuclear power, petrochemical, and other energy equipment to provide durable elastic solutions for systems.
features.roboticsDescription: In the field of automation and robotics, precision springs are used for motion control and shock absorption to improve flexibility and durability.
features.howItWorksDescription: We use proprietary and off-the-shelf hardware and software to build completely unique solutions at high speed and with low risk.
features.step1Description: Align application scenarios with technical indicators: dimensions/load/life/environment and standards; receive drawings or 3D/CAD to clarify boundary conditions and quality targets.
features.step2Description: Material and wire diameter selection, spring geometry and tolerance design; simulation verification (stress/fatigue/thermal/vibration), rapid sample processing and laboratory testing (force-stroke curve, fatigue life, consistency).
features.step3Description: Validation according to IATF16949/PPAP, establishing process windows and SPC control; mass production and traceability; continuous improvement based on field data, supporting version iteration and cost reduction.
features.iterativeDevelopment: Iterative development with customers to meet their needs
features.feedbackIntegration: Customer feedback integrated at every stage
features.marketLaunchDescription: Ready to scale, produce, and launch
features.scenariosDescription: Explore how our textile sensor technology is applied in various professional fields, from emergency response to construction and sports.
features.sensorPerformance: These examples show how our textile sensors enhance safety and performance
features.hoverCardStep1: Our proprietary technology provides the core foundation for every solution.
features.hoverCardStep2: We carefully select the best off-the-shelf components to complement our proprietary technology.
features.hoverCardStep3: Our manufacturing partners ensure quality in large-scale production.

whyWrlds.title: Why Choose ISRI-Shuangdi?
whyWrlds.subtitle: Combining a century of German precision spring manufacturing experience from ISRINGHAUSEN with Zhejiang Shuangdi's local manufacturing strength, we offer both advanced international technology and localized service capabilities.
whyWrlds.heritage: A century of German ISRINGHAUSEN heritage, with world-leading spring technology and manufacturing experience.
whyWrlds.certifications: 4 major international certifications, ensuring product quality and performance.
whyWrlds.clients: 30+ industry clients, ensuring product quality and performance.
whyWrlds.whatWeDoSubtitle: We transform your ideas into market-ready solutions with tangible business benefits.
whyWrlds.newRevenueDescription: Develop high-value precision spring products to meet emerging needs in automotive, aerospace, energy, and robotics industries.
whyWrlds.customerAttractionDescription: Earn the trust of global clients with leading spring design and manufacturing technology.
whyWrlds.comfortZoneDescription: We tackle the technical challenges of extreme conditions, ensuring your products remain reliable.
whyWrlds.brandBuildingDescription: Propel your brand into the future with world-class spring technology and quality standards.
whyWrlds.learnMoreButton: Learn about our structured development process

projects.title: The Trusted Choice of Global Clients
projects.subtitle: From automotive giants to aerospace, our precision spring technology has earned the trust of clients worldwide.

zf.title: Automotive Components
zf.testimonial: "The spring products provided by ISRI-Shuangdi consistently exceed our requirements for durability and precision. Their commitment to quality and innovation makes them a trusted partner in our global supply chain."

valeo.title: Powertrain Systems
valeo.testimonial: "Their clutch and powertrain springs feature exceptional precision engineering. Lean manufacturing and rigorous testing give us confidence in every batch of components."

tesla.title: Electric Vehicle Suspension
tesla.testimonial: "Innovation drives the EV market, and their customized suspension springs have helped us deliver a safe and comfortable driving experience to customers worldwide."

aerospace.title: Aerospace Systems
aerospace.description: Advanced materials and rigorous testing ensure systems meet the highest international standards
aerospace.testimonial: "Reliability in extreme conditions is paramount. Their advanced materials and rigorous testing ensure our aerospace systems meet the highest international standards."

robotics.title: Robotics & Automation
robotics.description: Precision springs are core components of our robotic systems, providing smooth and reliable motion control
robotics.testimonial: "Their precision springs are core components of our robotic systems. Their consistency and sensitivity provide smooth and reliable motion control for critical automation applications."
